oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Gabarus Bay.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Manuscript maps.; Maps shelf.; Brun Guide.; Views, topographical (Louisbourg, N.S.); Louisbourg (N.S.)--Maps, Manuscript.; Gabarus Bay (N.S.)--Maps, Manuscript.; Nova Scotia--Maps, Manuscript.; United States--History--French and Indian War, 1754-1763--Maps, Manuscript.; Louisbourg (N.S.)--History--Siege, 1758--Maps, Manuscript.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Coastal profile-style map of the bay where British troops landed in 1758 to besiege Louisbourg.; Table of references to main points of landing and French defenses.; Pasted to Wight, E. An exact ground plan of Fort Edward.
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: William L. Clements Library Image Bank
